thread.title: This Actress Says Salman Khan Doesn't Look 50 From Any Angle!
thread.title_full: This Actress Says Salman Khan Doesn't Look 50 From Any Angle!

title: This Actress Says Salman Khan Doesn't Look 50 From Any Angle!
text:
Posted by: Vinod D'souza Published: Wednesday, October 21, 2015, 18:31 [IST] 
Shamita Shetty , says that Salman Khan doesn't look like 50 from any angle and is a super hot actor. Salman, would turn 50 in the month December and the actress says he is getting better with age. Shilpa Shetty 's sister, Shamita Shetty, is currently in Mumbai for the promotions of Salman Khan and Sonam Kapoor starrer Prem Ratan Dhan Payo , and the actress was quoted as saying,"Salman doesn't look 50 from any angle. I think he is getting better with age. He is still super hot."Shamita Shetty, would be seen in an opening dance act along with Salman Khan, for the promotions of Prem Ratan Dhan Payo in Mumbai. Zeher , was a super-hit movie that starred Shamita Shetty and Emraan Hashmi in 2005. The actress did a few more Bollywood movies but it failed to make a mark at the box office.However, Shamita says she misses Bollywood and will be back with a bang. She was quoted as saying, "I promise that you will see me soon on the big screen." 
Prem Ratan Dhan Payo , is all set to hit theatres on November 12, 2015. This Actress Says Salman Khan Doesn't Look 50 From Any Angle! 1/16 Shilpa Shetty-Shamita Shetty
